sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.page.html', styleUrls: ['./login.page.scss'], }) export class LoginPage implements OnInit { form = new FormGroup({ email: new FormControl('', [Validators.required, Validators.email]), password: new FormControl('', [Validators.required]) }) constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } submit(){ console.log(this.form.value); } }
